## 1 - Road traffic accidents in Edinburgh

```{r label-me-1}
accidents <- read_csv("/cloud/project/data/accidents.csv")
glimpse(accidents)
accidents <- accidents |> 
  mutate (
    day = case_when(
      day_of_week %in% c("Monday", "Tuesday", "Wednesday", "Thursday", "Friday") ~ "Weekday",
      TRUE ~ "Weekend"
    )
  )
glimpse(accidents)
accidents |>
  count(id, time, severity, day) |>
  ggplot(aes(x = time, fill = severity)) + 
  geom_density(alpha = 0.6) +
  facet_wrap(~ day, scales = "free_y", ncol = 1, nrow = 2) +
  scale_fill_manual("Severity", values = c("purple", "cyan", "yellow")) +
  labs(title = "Number of accidents throught the day",
       x = "Time of Day",
       y = "Density")
```
